TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Yu-li-u-skay-sa, title = Yu-li-u-skay-sa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yu-li-u-skay-sa} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Kay-u-s.Yu-li-us.Kay-sa "kamu nu La-tin, Gaius Iulius Caesar, ayaw tu 100 a mihca 7 a bulad 12 a demiad ayaw nu 44 a mihca 3 a bulad 15 a demiad", anucaay pabelin ci Zu-lye.Kay-sa han, likisi pangangan Kay-sa-ta-ti anucaay Low-ma-kung-he-kow u situngusa nu mikuwanay, Low-ma-kung-he-kow nikuzanay a mihcaan sakakaay nu mikelidaay tu hitay, cen-ce-cya, nu Low-ma-kung-he-kow a lekec maniyul pasayzaLow-ma-ti-kow nu kahenulan a tademaw. nu La-tin sulit nu misulitay tu san-wen. 蓋烏斯·尤利烏斯·凱撒(拉丁語:Gaius Iulius Caesar；前100年7月12日—前44年3月15日), . nilaculan ayaw nu 44 a mihcaan ci Kay-sa mapacu' ni Pu-lu-tu nu kakelidan a yen-law-yen a tademaw. mapatay tu cu Kay-sa hawsa, u sinawawa atu nipahabanay a wawa ci U-ta-wi mademec ci An-tung-ni malingatu patizeng tu Low-mw-ti kow mala u saayaway ti-kow a hungti "kamu nu L-tin, Imperator" nikauzip a luma'家世背景 Kay-sa ayaw nu kung-yen 100a mihca 7 a bilad lecuh I Low-mw, u ama niza ci Kay-u-s.yu-li-u-s.Kay-sa atu ina ci Aw-lye-li-ya tusa lalumaan hatu u kakitaan, namahini kapah ku niading. wama celahan ayaw nu 100 a mihcaan ayaw zikuz sutungus tu miazihay tu zaysang, sakakaay nu sutungusay tu hulic a kawaw, natahal mala Syaw-ya-si-ya nu sakakaay mikuwanay tu kawaw. bakian ci Say-ke-s-tu-s.Zu-lye "Sextus Julius" wama celahan kung-yen 91 a mihcaan macakat u ce-cen-kuwang a kawaw. u bai ci Cu-li-ya mikadabu tu singanganay a Ma-lye. u baki ci Ma-lye u yen-law-yen mikeliday tu binwlan, kung-yen ayaw nu 86 a mihcaan mapatay. u baki ci Lu-si-u-s.Aw-lay-li-u-s.Ke-ta, naiayaw nu 119 a mihcaa mala ce-cen-kwang. micidek i Kay-sa a sakakawawan ngatu a malingatu, baki mahiza tu micukel atu izaw ku pilunguc kanca a misulul tu, sisa katuud icelang sa micukel ci Kay-saan. Wina ni Kay-sa makay siicelangay kakitaan a luma' ci Aw-lay-li.Ke-ta. ci Kay-sa masakapahay a mihcaan a nikauzip, micidek ku pizawis niza tu nipasubana' a kawaw, azaaw ku nisulitan, caay kahapinang. atu uyza a zidayan cimacima a masakapahay nu Low-ma a kakitaan malecad tu, katukuh 7 ku mihcaan pahezek, ci Kay-sa mahiza malilid nu wina.namahini miduduc tu laylay, i pinanaman pahezek tu Latin a silit atu aasipan a sulit atu La-tin a cidad, Si-la a cudad zikuz, ci Kay-sa mala saydan makay minanam au saydan, mananam papelu macacuyaku, namahiza , minanam henay ciniza tu ce-sye atu hulic a anganngan a tineng, zazikuzay, malecad tu hamin nu kakitaan a wawa, mizawis tu kawaw nu hitay tu nalimaan nipasubana', pasu miasip tu canacanan a likisi, milais tu niyazu' atu tineng malalais a nisilitan, milihiza tu canacanan a kawawan nu hitay miecaw tu uzip. 7 ku mihcaan hawsa, ci Kay-sa mapatayza sinmungay pahabay tu kakitaan a wawa a cacudadan. 15 ku mihcaan hawsa duduc tu lisin nu Low-mw, Kay-sa malingatu tu sicadung tu tanaya'ay salengacay a zikuc tu Su-la與蘇拉的衝突 kung-yen ayaw nu 86 a mihcaan atua yaw nu 84 a mihcaan, yen-law-yen a binawlan miculcul tu mikeliday ci Ma-lye atu ci Cin-na zazikuzay mapatay, saayaway u baki ni Kay-sa, zikuz nanipatahkalan pangangan ci Kay-sa mala u mapalaway ci Cu-pi-te, ci Kay-sa silalumaan mala u M-lye acasa u micukelay. kanahatu ci Kay-sa kasenun malawpes ku tatusaay midiputay a tademaw, nika malecad pakala tu canacanan a kawawan maala ku tabakiay a nalekuan a kawaw a paydang. ayaw nu 84 a mihcaan ci Kay-sa siacawa ci Cin-na a tatayna a wawaan ci-Nye-li-ya a acawa. uyni kalaacawa caay ku pabeliay tu cacay a tataynaan a wawa dada' ci Yu-li-ya, asaca macukel nu yen-law-yen binawlan a niculculan. ayaw nu 82 a mihcaan, i pilalaisan makademec, macukel nu yen-law-yen iyung nituzean a tademaw tekeday sakakaay nu mikeliday ci Su-la misalunguc ci Kay-saan lecaday a ke ci Nye-li-ye malaliyas. nika, Kay-sa mipili' makai sabalucu' sa miliyas tu Low-ma. piedap nu laluma'an cabay, ci Kay-sa makalimek tu nipatalaw paydang atu patay. kanahatu zikuz ci Su-lay misulul sakay masakapahay a Kay-sa tu canacanan tabakiay a ngelu' a misulul tu zikuzay, nika ci Kay-sa mahizatu ahicasa amiliyas tu Low-ma sangaleb mihaymaw ku balucu'.

== kakiliman == Kay-o-s.Yo-li-os.Kay-sa "kamo no La-tin, Gaios Iolios Caesar, ayaw to 100 a mihca 7 a bolad 12 a demiad ayaw no 44 a mihca 3 a bolad 15 a demiad", anocaay pabelin ci Zo-lye.Kay-sa han, likisi pangangan Kay-sa-ta-ti anocaay Low-ma-kong-he-kow o sitongosa no mikowanay, Low-ma-kong-he-kow nikozanay a mihcaan sakakaay no mikelidaay to hitay, cen-ce-cya, no Low-ma-kong-he-kow a lekec maniyol pasayzaLow-ma-ti-kow no kahenolan a tademaw. no La-tin solit no misolitay to san-wen. 蓋烏斯·尤利烏斯·凱撒(拉丁語:Gaios Iolios Caesar；前100年7月12日—前44年3月15日), . nilacolan ayaw no 44 a mihcaan ci Kay-sa mapaco' ni Po-lo-to no kakelidan a yen-law-yen a tademaw. mapatay to co Kay-sa hawsa, o sinawawa ato nipahabanay a wawa ci U-ta-wi mademec ci An-tong-ni malingato patizeng to Low-mw-ti kow mala o saayaway ti-kow a hongti "kamo no L-tin, Imperator" nikaozip a loma'家世背景 Kay-sa ayaw no kong-yen 100a mihca 7 a bilad lecoh I Low-mw, o ama niza ci Kay-o-s.yo-li-o-s.Kay-sa ato ina ci Aw-lye-li-ya tosa lalomaan hato o kakitaan, namahini kapah ko niading. wama celahan ayaw no 100 a mihcaan ayaw zikoz sotongos to miazihay to zaysang, sakakaay no sotongosay to holic a kawaw, natahal mala Syaw-ya-si-ya no sakakaay mikowanay to kawaw. bakian ci Say-ke-s-to-s.Zo-lye "Sextos Jolios" wama celahan kong-yen 91 a mihcaan macakat o ce-cen-kowang a kawaw. o bai ci Co-li-ya mikadabo to singanganay a Ma-lye. o baki ci Ma-lye o yen-law-yen mikeliday to binwlan, kong-yen ayaw no 86 a mihcaan mapatay. o baki ci Lo-si-o-s.Aw-lay-li-o-s.Ke-ta, naiayaw no 119 a mihcaa mala ce-cen-kwang. micidek i Kay-sa a sakakawawan ngato a malingato, baki mahiza to micokel ato izaw ko pilongoc kanca a misolol to, sisa katood icelang sa micokel ci Kay-saan. Wina ni Kay-sa makay siicelangay kakitaan a loma' ci Aw-lay-li.Ke-ta. ci Kay-sa masakapahay a mihcaan a nikaozip, micidek ko pizawis niza to nipasobana' a kawaw, azaaw ko nisolitan, caay kahapinang. ato oyza a zidayan cimacima a masakapahay no Low-ma a kakitaan malecad to, katokoh 7 ko mihcaan pahezek, ci Kay-sa mahiza malilid no wina.namahini midodoc to laylay, i pinanaman pahezek to Latin a silit ato aasipan a solit ato La-tin a cidad, Si-la a codad zikoz, ci Kay-sa mala saydan makay minanam ao saydan, mananam papelo macacoyako, namahiza , minanam henay ciniza to ce-sye ato holic a anganngan a tineng, zazikozay, malecad to hamin no kakitaan a wawa, mizawis to kawaw no hitay to nalimaan nipasobana', paso miasip to canacanan a likisi, milais to niyazo' ato tineng malalais a nisilitan, milihiza to canacanan a kawawan no hitay miecaw to ozip. 7 ko mihcaan hawsa, ci Kay-sa mapatayza sinmongay pahabay to kakitaan a wawa a cacodadan. 15 ko mihcaan hawsa dodoc to lisin no Low-mw, Kay-sa malingato to sicadong to tanaya'ay salengacay a zikoc to So-la與蘇拉的衝突 kong-yen ayaw no 86 a mihcaan atoa yaw no 84 a mihcaan, yen-law-yen a binawlan micolcol to mikeliday ci Ma-lye ato ci Cin-na zazikozay mapatay, saayaway o baki ni Kay-sa, zikoz nanipatahkalan pangangan ci Kay-sa mala o mapalaway ci Co-pi-te, ci Kay-sa silalomaan mala o M-lye acasa o micokelay. kanahato ci Kay-sa kasenon malawpes ko tatosaay midipotay a tademaw, nika malecad pakala to canacanan a kawawan maala ko tabakiay a nalekoan a kawaw a paydang. ayaw no 84 a mihcaan ci Kay-sa siacawa ci Cin-na a tatayna a wawaan ci-Nye-li-ya a acawa. oyni kalaacawa caay ko pabeliay to cacay a tataynaan a wawa dada' ci Yo-li-ya, asaca macokel no yen-law-yen binawlan a nicolcolan. ayaw no 82 a mihcaan, i pilalaisan makademec, macokel no yen-law-yen iyong nitozean a tademaw tekeday sakakaay no mikeliday ci So-la misalongoc ci Kay-saan lecaday a ke ci Nye-li-ye malaliyas. nika, Kay-sa mipili' makai sabaloco' sa miliyas to Low-ma. piedap no laloma'an cabay, ci Kay-sa makalimek to nipatalaw paydang ato patay. kanahato zikoz ci So-lay misolol sakay masakapahay a Kay-sa to canacanan tabakiay a ngelo' a misolol to zikozay, nika ci Kay-sa mahizato ahicasa amiliyas to Low-ma sangaleb mihaymaw ko baloco'.
